query: SELECT b.id, b.customerId, b.totalUsageKwh, b.solarExportsKwh, b.feedInTariffCents, b.billingDays FROM bills b JOIN customers c ON b.customerId = c.id WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Stuart%' AND b.billType = 'electricity'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT b.id, b.customerId, b.totalUsageKwh, b.solarExportsKwh, b.feedInTariffCents, b.billingDays FROM bills b JOIN customers c ON b.customerId = c.id WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Stuart%' AND b.billType = 'electricity'
